message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this valuable product to you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $1200000. This is a competitive offer, and I'm confident you'll find it hard to resist.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to offer $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save money, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $900000. I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product at a price of $1100000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the market demand. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal.

I understand that you're still holding out for a higher price, Alice, but I'm not willing to go above $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950000 for the product. I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
